title: I am not good in Korean and I can not rap, but I can sing kind of well. What songs should I prepare for an online audition for JYP? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah Dude You Can Try For It !! You Can Practice For A Good Song Or You Can Give A Try For It!! Coz It Will Be Helpful For You Next Audition Practices So You Can Give A Try For It!! I Too Saw That JYP Audition!! But I'm 10th Now So I'm Gonna Do It Next Time!! Practice Makes A Man Perfect!! There Is No Problem If U Can't Rap!! You Know To Sing Right? 😌!! And Practice A Little Bit For Dance Too!! Coz You Are Gonna Be A Idol!! So U Should Know To Dance A Little Bit It Will Be Easy For You 🤠!! Fighting 💪!! All The Best!! I'm Getting Jealous 😌😌 Lol!! Coz U Have Time To Participate In Audition!! Congratulations!! Practice Well!! You Can Call Me Artist You Can Call Me Idol ～Suddenly Started To Sing 'Idol' By Bts Thank You ～W～

You shoul try for as a vocalist: (1)SELENA GOMEZ: wolwes (2)LADY GAGA FEAT BLACKPINK: sour candy.(it has a unique rap so u can try that as a vocalist too) (3)BTS: we don't talk anymore ( JUNKOOK and jin) (4)JUSTIN BIEBER: let me love you (5)ELLIE GOULDING: love me like you do and burn. (6)BTS FEAT CHARLIE XTX: dream glow.
